title: PBE
body: I have a question my old account got banned because it was hacked would it effect my chances of getting on the PBE? Just was wondering. If   replied thank you for replying. {{champion:67}} {{item:3153}}

replies.body:
Eligibility for PBE access is determined on a per-account basis, so if your other account was banned due to being compromised, it won't affect your eligibility on this account. Our [PBE FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751904-Public-Beta-Environment-FAQ#top) covers the system and how it exactly works.

Let me know if you have any questions.
